In addition to the recipes shown in JEI, amethyst shards can also be grown using budding amethyst as a catalyst.
In this pack, budding amethyst does not naturally cause attached buds to grow, and require crystal growth accelerator to be spouted on them.
For every 500mb of crystal growth accelerator spouted, a random amethyst bud attached to the budding amethyst will advance one growth stage.
kubejs.ponder.portal_block_open.text_1: Right click a crying obsidian block with a source gem to open an Arcane Portal.
kubejs.ponder.portal_block_open.text_2: Once you open the portal, it requires a constant supply of liquefied source to stay open.
kubejs.ponder.portal_block_open.text_3: The Arcane Portal will consume a random liquefied source block  every so often.
kubejs.ponder.portal_block_open.text_4: If you don't replace the liquid source, the portal will rapidly become unstable and collapse.
kubejs.ponder.portal_block_usage.text_1: The portal will absorb wandering traders.
kubejs.ponder.portal_block_usage.text_2: The portal will also absorb correctly enchanted named pickaxes. The quest book will guide you on how to make the appropriate sacrifice.
kubejs.ponder.portal_block_usage.text_3: With the right sacrifices, the eldritch gods will be appeased and grant you a reward.
kubejs.ponder.remy_the_epicure.text_1: Right click the Remy Spawner on a block to spawn Remy The Epicure
kubejs.ponder.remy_the_epicure.text_2: Feed Remy some tasty food and he will drop amethyst buds.
kubejs.ponder.remy_the_epicure.text_3: Feeding can be automated with the deployer.
kubejs.ponder.remy_the_epicure.text_4: Feeding higher quality foods will result in more drops.
kubejs.ponder.remy_the_epicure.text_5: Remy will get tired of the same food over and over though.
kubejs.ponder.remy_the_epicure.text_6: There is a small cooldown every time you feed Remy.
kubejs.ponder.remy_the_epicure.text_7: Be careful not to feed Remy anything that'll give him an upset stomach
kubejs.ponder.remy_the_epicure.text_8: You won't be able to feed Remy until the effect wears off.
